snippet: C.C. Sabathia, who has been one of the Yankees’ few healthy stalwarts but has hardly pitched like one, struggled with his command and fell to 0-4 in his last five starts.
lead_paragraph: C.C. Sabathia, who has been one of the Yankees’ few healthy stalwarts but has hardly pitched like one, struggled with his command and fell to 0-4 in his last five starts.

headline.main: Sabathia’s Woes Continue as Yankees Struggle to Find Groove
headline.print_headline: Sabathia’s Woes Continue as Yankees Struggle to Find Groove
